sentences.en: Ask then: " Your size bullion does not want, what? "
sentences.cn: 于是问道: “ 你大小金块都不要, 却要什么? ”

sentences.en: Authorities have seen his luxurious villa, antiques, art works and gold bullion.
sentences.cn: 当局已经看到了他的豪华别墅 、 古玩 、 艺术作品和金条.

sentences.en: Bribes have to be paid, often in gold bullion.
sentences.cn: 贿赂常常以金条的方式来支付.

sentences.en: Bullion - Gold and Silver, Gold, Silver, Precious Metals, Rough Diamonds.
sentences.cn: 采购产品金银 - 黄金和白银, 黄金, 白银, 贵金属, 毛坯钻石.

sentences.en: Bullion - Gold and Silver, Ores Tantalo, Gold, Amethyst, Crystal BullionSilver.
sentences.cn: 采购产品金块 - 黄金和银, 矿石, 黄金, 紫水晶, 水晶.
我们经营大额存单 、 金融期货和金银块买卖.

sentences.en: In the London bullion market yesterday, the price of gold was steady.
sentences.cn: 昨天伦敦金银市场黄金价格稳定.

sentences.en: Large quantities of bullion are stored in the castle.
Much bullion is stored in the vaults at Fort Knox.
sentences.cn: 福特·诺克斯家的地窖里藏了很多金条.

sentences.en: Police have launched a man - hunt for the bullion robbers.
sentences.cn: 警方已大举搜捕抢劫金条的罪犯.

sentences.en: Sugar, Boats, Bullion - Gold and Silver, Metal Products and Powder, Scrap.
sentences.cn: 采购产品糖, 船, 金块 - 黄金和银, 金属产品和粉, 小片.

sentences.en: Textiles, Readymade Garments , Jewelry, Bullion - Gold and Silver, Garments, Jewellery.
sentences.cn: 采购产品纺织品, 成衣, 珠宝, 金块 - 黄金和银.

sentences.en: The Client acknowledges that the account is for the bullion margin trading.
sentences.cn: 客户确认本户口是作为贵金属孖展买卖用途.

sentences.en: The gold bullion was transported under police escort.
sentences.cn: 金锭在警方的护送下运走了.

sentences.en: Two that have done investors proud are the yen and gold bullion.
sentences.cn: 让投资者引以为傲的两类资产是日元和黄金.

trans.tran_cn: 金条，（视为原材料的）金，银，金（或银）丝饰带
